636580.name: Primal Reign
636580.description:
Primal Reign returns — rebuilt from the ground up.

What began in 2019 as a small experimental VR project has evolved into a bigger beast, we are expanding the IP, With Primal Reign: The Age of New Kings entering early access, we have a free playable demo as well as an extended playthough as a thank you should you wish to supports us through early access. This is exactly why we wanted to re-visit Primal Reign and bring it inline with the new story and give the original tomb a make over with new art, new enemies and lots of new weapons.

Set deep inside an ancient Egyptian mummification tomb, the battle converges around a single Explorer.

You are Harriet; a British Archaeologist who has found herself separated from her partner Ron — alone, outnumbered, and surrounded.

For ten ferocious waves, prehistoric beasts and reanimated mummies pour in from every direction. There is no cover you can rely on. No safe angle. No mercy. Only instinct, movement, and firepower.

Core Experience

10 escalating waves of relentless enemies

Prehistoric creatures and ancient Egyptian mummies attacking from all sides

A tightly designed single-arena tomb, built for spatial awareness and constant threat

Limited health with unlimited ammunition — survival is about positioning, not hoarding

Enemies can (and will) approach from any direction — including behind you

Trench tools at the ready, we're going back in.

This rebuild focuses on what VR does best:

Physical presence

Spatial pressure

Immediate feedback

Every weapon, enemy, and movement decision is designed to keep you engaged during intense combat, this is for VR veterans.

Interaction

Multiple firearms suited to frantic close-quarters combat

Bazooka and explosive barrels for crowd control

Stronger enemy behaviour

Sharper focus on fun first gameplay

Rather than abandon it, we rebuilt it — and released the updated version free as a thank-you to the VR community that supported us early on.

AHEAD: PRIMAL REIGN – THE AGE OF NEW KINGS

If you enjoy this wave shooter, be sure to check out our upcoming story-driven VR action game:

Primal Reign: The Age of New Kings

A full narrative VR experience set in the same universe, featuring:

Story-led gameplay

Cinematic moments built specifically for VR

A playable demo

An extended Early Access gameplay segment

Available now on Steam.
